name: Named Editor Layers
description: Adds names for the editor layers

in-edit-groups-menu.name: Layer names in 'Edit Group' menu
in-edit-groups-menu.description: Show layer names in 'Edit Group' menu. You can also <cj>click</c> on the name text to select the layer

use-save-object.name: Use special 'save object'
use-save-object.description:
Store layer names in a special text object in the level. This allows you to share layer names when sharing/publishing a level
(this text object is located far to the left in editor an updated automatically with level save)
